Articles.Content: Not sure what causes this, but occasionally after I build a craft and press launch, nothing happens, no error message, no loading screen, this persists after multiple presses and usually can only be fixed by restarting the game (I have not tried to relaunch the same craft after restarting the game)
Forgot to add- switching launch location has no effect
Reloading the game will usually fix it for me
yep, that bug is there from day 1 - it happens after you "revert to VAB" for the first time - not sure if they called it "fixed" in 0.1.1 patchnote - but obviously it is still there
